SELECT SI_NIGHT_SETTING_ID,
MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME,
USER_KEY, DATA_NO, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, RENEW_USER_ID, RENEW_DATE, TS
FROM SI_NIGHT_SETTING
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0
ORDER BY MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME

INSERT INTO SI_NIGHT_SETTING( SI_NIGHT_SETTING_ID,
MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_NIGHT_SETTING_ID,
:MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, :MS_VESSEL_ID, :START_TIME, :END_TIME,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_NIGHT_SETTING SET MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID = :MS_SENIN_COMPANY_ID, MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID, START_TIME = :START_TIME, END_TIME = :END_TIME,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_NIGHT_SETTING_ID = :SI_NIGHT_SETTING_ID AND TS = :TS
